data.lyric:
[ti:Happy Xmas (War Is Over) (Alternate Mix)]
[ar:John Lennon/小野洋子 (Yoko Ono)]
[al:Imagine (The Ultimate Mixes Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Happy Xmas (War Is Over) (Alternate Mix) - John Lennon (约翰·列侬)/小野洋子 (Yoko Ono)
[00:00.13]Lyrics by：John Lennon/Yoko Ono
[00:00.26]Composed by：John Lennon/Yoko Ono
[00:00.39]Produced by：John Lennon/Yoko Ono/Phil Spector/Yoko Ono Lennon
[00:00.52]So this is Christmas
[00:05.07]And what have you done
[00:10.12]Another year over
[00:14.68]And a new one just begun
[00:19.38]And so this is Christmas
[00:24.22]I hope you have fun
[00:29.03]The near and the dear ones
[00:33.86]The old and the young
[00:38.96]A very merry Christmas
[00:43.53]And a happy new year
[00:48.34]Let's hope it's a good one
[00:53.38]Without any fear
[00:58.42]And so this is Christmas
[01:03.13]For weak and for strong
[01:08.01]For rich and the poor ones
[01:13.00]The road is so long
[01:17.86]And so happy Christmas
[01:22.73]For black and for white
[01:27.71]For yellow and red ones
[01:32.56]Let's stop all the fight
[01:37.47]A very merry Christmas
[01:42.36]And a happy new year
[01:47.34]Let's hope it's a good one
[01:52.10]Without any fear
[01:57.44]And so this is Christmas
[02:02.19]And what have we done
[02:07.38]Another year over
[02:12.08]And a new one just begun
[02:16.90]And so happy Christmas
[02:21.86]We hope you have fun
[02:26.86]The near and the dear one
[02:31.87]The old and the young
[02:36.79]A very merry Christmas
[02:41.61]And a happy new year
[02:46.70]Let's hope it's a good one
[02:51.51]Without any fear
[02:58.19]War is over if you want it
[03:08.01]War is over now
data.trans:
[ti:Happy Xmas (War Is Over) (Alternate Mix)]
[ar:John Lennon/小野洋子 (Yoko Ono)]
[al:Imagine (The Ultimate Mixes Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.26]//
[00:00.39]//
[00:00.52]这就是圣诞节
[00:05.07]你做了什么
[00:10.12]又过了一年
[00:14.68]新的开始
[00:19.38]这就是圣诞节
[00:24.22]我希望你玩得开心
[00:29.03]身边的人和亲爱的人
[00:33.86]无论老少
[00:38.96]一个快乐的圣诞节
[00:43.53]还有新年快乐
[00:48.34]让我们期盼这是美好的一天
[00:53.38]没有任何恐惧
[00:58.42]这就是圣诞节
[01:03.13]无论弱者还是强者
[01:08.01]无论贫富
[01:13.00]路漫漫其修远兮
[01:17.86]圣诞快乐
[01:22.73]为了黑为了白
[01:27.71]黄色和红色的
[01:32.56]让我们别再争吵
[01:37.47]一个快乐的圣诞节
[01:42.36]还有新年快乐
[01:47.34]让我们期盼这是美好的一天
[01:52.10]没有任何恐惧
[01:57.44]这就是圣诞节
[02:02.19]我们做了什么
[02:07.38]又过了一年
[02:12.08]新的开始
[02:16.90]圣诞快乐
[02:21.86]我们希望你玩得开心
[02:26.86]亲密无间的人
[02:31.87]无论老少
[02:36.79]一个快乐的圣诞节
[02:41.61]还有新年快乐
[02:46.70]让我们期盼这是美好的一天
[02:51.51]没有任何恐惧
[02:58.19]如果你想要战争就结束吧
[03:08.01]战争已经结束
